Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: calino texture files must end with exactly one End section, which has the identifier 0x434C4E5F454E4421 and must be of size 0.
End sections are encoded as follows:
There should be no trailing data in the texture file after the End section.

Subsection.title: Cardinality
Subsection.Paragraph: An End section must appear in a calino texture file exactly once, and must be the last section present in the file.
